mil.nga.giat.geowave.mapreduce

Class JobContextAdapterStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.giat.geowave.mapreduce.JobContextAdapterStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AdapterStore

    public class JobContextAdapterStore
extends Object
implements AdapterStore
    This class implements an adapter store by first checking the job context for an adapter and keeping a local cache of adapters that have been discovered. It will check the metadata store if it cannot find an adapter in the job context.
